1.content:
Mewtwo was board. This was not one of those absence of things to do board, no, it was one of those "I'm-missing-something-important-in-my-life" kind of boards.

He got up from the sofa and half walked half floated over to the kitchen. He reflected on how, even though he was now recognized as the first Pokemon citizen, had his own house, and worked for Prof. Oak as a lab assistant, he still felt that he wanted to do something with his free time.

As he pulled out the makings of a ham and cheese sandwich, he reflected on just how much he had changed, as well. Since Jessy, James, and Meowth has left Team Rocket a month before the organization crumbled away, and thanks to Mewtwo who vouched for them, the were given full pardons for ever being in the team. Recently they had started their own pokemon Gym right there in Pallet Town.

Meowth, in gratitude, had been coming over to Mewtwos home for the past month and a half to teach him about human culture and to help him begin to speak English like himself. For even though Mewtwo could convey his thoughts on a level deeper than words, it made people more comfortable around him if he would speak to them instead of using his psychic powers. But only a few days ago, after Meowths session with him, Meowth had announced that Mewtwo know knew just as much about humans as he did. There was simply nothing more to teach.

Mewtwo sat back on the couch, after finishing the sandwich, remembering that, that was not all that had changed about himself recently. He had become more calm. He respected others, humans and pokemon alike, for their accomplishments.

He awoke suddenly, he hadn't even noticed it when his remembrances had slipped into dreams. As he tried to get up he noticed that his center of weight had shifted. Looking down he realized what was wrong. his stomach (or equivalent there of) had bulged out around four inches. He quickly teleported upstairs to the bathroom, Mewtwo knew he must have put on some weight, even though he didn't look like it his normal weight was usually 268 pounds, but upon stopping on the counter it shot up to 318 pounds! A fifty pound weight gain since that morning. There was only one pokemon he knew of that would pull such a prank.

<MEW!> he bellowed.

The small pink cat-like creature appeared

*Translated

*Yes?* she asked in her syrupy sweet voice she used whenever she was in trouble.
<What did you do this time?>
*What ever do you mean?*
<This!> he said pointing to his enlarged gut, <I know you're behind it so own up already.>
*Ok fine I did it*
<Why?>
*Because you look so mush cuter with a bit of a belly on you and I happen to know that over weight people tend to be happier*

Mewtwo thought about this and realized he did feel happier. As well as warm an comfortable.

<You're right. I DO feel better!>

He thought about this and decided if this little gain made him feel this much better, what if he gained more?

<Mew, will you help me gain weight?>

Mew was a bit taken aback by this but agreed

<OK then let's get started>

*Hold on there. there are other types of bigness you could enjoy too, ya know?*


Which path will Mewtwo choose?
1.title: Big Decisions

11.content:
<Mew, what exactly did you do cause this?>
*Simple, I just increased the calories in the mayonnaise and increased the starch in the bread. That's all.*
<Well I hope you feel up for doing it a lot more.>

With that, Mewtwo teleported down to the kitchen and Mew followed close behind.

*So where should we start?*
<Well...>
11.title: Begining the path to obeisity

choices: Take you to a thin club. (To scare the members)
111.content:
<Could you make all the food in my kitchen fatty so I can grow?>

*Sure thing.* said Mew

2 mins later *Done.*

<DINNERTIME> said Mewtwo to himself.

Scarfing down all the food he can find, Mewtwo begins to grow. Starting with his thighs ballooning out till their each the size of a barrel and constantly touching as he moved.

His but and tail started next, each cheek reaching the size of a couch cushion and drooping down to the middle of his thighs. His tail grew so much he could no longer lift it, so he let it drag on the ground, bigger than an Arbok in diameter.

His gut and chest came next, with his stomach pushing out and then down till it almost touched the floor and stuck out about three feet, his chest grew soft and flabby with his pecs flowing down his stomach in a pair of man boobs that would make most women jealous.

Last came his arms, neck, and head. His arms grew thick and lumpy, with his upper arm drooping down enough to cover his elbow and hands to puffed out that he couldn't even bend his fingers (it was a good thing he could levitate the food into his mouth or he would have stopped by now). His neck had long since vanished into a thick collar as big around as a car tire. His face too had grown thicker, with cheeks the size of softballs.

After eating every bit of food in the house, though, he was still hungry.

*You're quite a butterball now.* said Mew floating near Mewtwo. *So what should we do? *
<I'm not big enough yet Mew. I need more food or I might turn cannibal.>

* OK then. Were going to…*
111.title: Big Fat Mewtwo

1111.content: Entering the KFC, Mew orders all of the food for Mewtwo. Cleaning out the entire restaurant of food, Mewtwo starts eating. His giant stomach grew more squishy, his cheeks drooped down more, and his thighs buldged with fat. Now weighing well over 800lb he,
1111.title: KFC

choices: ...in front of the club with Mew.
1112.content:
*...take you to a fitness club!* Mew squealed.

<WHAT?! I said I wanted to get bigger, not smaller!> Mewtwo shot back.

Mew giggled. *Don't worry, I have a few ideas...* Mew did it's best evil grin, which looked almost comical on the small pokemon. *Let's go!* Mew zipped off.

Mewtwo grumbled and lifted his blubbery body slowly off the ground. <I just want some food...> He flew off after Mew. En route, Mewtwo took the time to explore his new mass, enjoying the way the wind rolled over his flabby form, the way it buffeted at his rolls. Barely moving his arm, he still managed to send a ripple of pleasure through himself.

When he had finally snapped out of his ecstatic daze, he found himself...
1112.title: Flying with Fat

choices: A All You Can Eat Restaurant
11121.content:
In the woods Mewtwo was lost, he did not know where he was so he decided to waddle north to see if he could get into a town and get some food into his ample belly.

Within moments he had found a town which was on his part sheer luck.

"Wow," He thought as he looked around, "I bet I could get some good food here.

Mewtwo continued looking around and found...
11121.title: Lost

choices: a path that leads to a forest
a path that leads to another city full of FOOD!
111211.content:
...an all you can eat restaurant. Mewtwo eyes grew to the size of dinner plates. He was licking his chops, then if he could bend his knees he would but he couldn't because of his weight. Mewtwo then levitated to the restaurant's doors.

Then, using a psychic blast of energy to blow open the doors. He was so fat that he couldn't even fit through the door, so he just forced himself through the door until the doors' edges bent the busted away.

He then levitated to the buffet. When someone actually tried to stop Mewtwo from getting food (the fools) he then blew them away and they actually blasted through the wall of the restaurant. Then, everyone in the restaurant backed away and let Mewtwo have his fill of food and he did.

He ate so much food that his butt cheeks were the size of monster truck wheels, his tail was the size of a of half an Onix, his gut and chest was that of an obese Snorlax, he had about 10 chins of fat, his face cheeks were about the size of basketballs, and his neck was the size of a tire.

After the had had his fill of food (for now) he made the front restaurant wall fly away so he could at least fit out of the restaurant. He then meet back up with Mew.

*Hey buddy I see you had some more fun with the food there.

<Yeah I did.>
<Hey you know what i could go for?>

*More food.

<You know it!>

So then Mew and the newly 950lb. Mewtwo set back on there adventure to get Mewtwo as fat as they possibly could.

<Hey guess what I see...>
111211.title: Mewtwo vs. the Buffet

1112111.content:
"What does that have to do with me getting fatter?" Mewtwo questioned

"There could be berries down there! Lots and lots of berries!" Mew said in his usual happy voice, at least physically.

"Hmmm, alright."

Mew and Mewtwo floated down to the forest floor. There were some berries here and there, but not enough to feed mewtwo at all. "Dang it... Oh well, no reason to let food go to waste" Mewtwo said dissapointed

While mewtwo was stuffing his face with what little berries there were, mew noticed something in the distance.

"Hey, Mewtwo look!"

"What?" Swallowing the last of the berries

"It's...
1112111.title: Into the forest

choices: Hook up the machines to power a feeding machine
Get people to come back and suck their fat into Mewtwo
11122.content:
*Hey!* Mew shouted telepathically, *Mewtwo, don’t phase on me now! Focus! I’ve got big plans for you.* Mew grinned as it flew over and squeezed up to the larger Pokemon’s soft gut.

<Big plans, huh?> Mewtwo replied, grinning as best as he could through his flabby face, <Like what?>

*I’ll tell you later! First, I want you to fly on in there and scare everyone out of there!*

<…I don’t get it, but okay,> Mewtwo said. The smaller Pokemon always seemed to have some sort of quirky plan that defied all logic, and Mewtwo had learned to just go with it, even if he didn’t fully understand. Mewtwo half waddled, half floated into the health club, telepathically shouting, <RAR! I am the spirit of the glutton! You have all offended me by your presence in this place, BEGONE!> He started using his mental powers to make people feel like they were fattening as they did so, though it was just a mental image. The club was empty in a matter of minutes.

Now ravished by hunger, Mewtwo flopped onto the floor and shouted again, <MEW! This better be a good plan, I’m starving!>

The pink Pokemon flew in, giggling and said, *Calm down big guy, I have a perfect plan. Here it goes…*

And so Mew told Mewtwo about his plan, which basically was…
11122.title: To the club!

choices: Just take as many as possible and head directly to a factory!
111221.content:
...to hook up the machines to power up a feeding machine!

"A-A feeding machine?!" Mewtwo stammered, a look of surprise and excitement appearing on the huge Psychic type's face as best as possible at Mew as the smaller Pokemon giggled and circled around.

"Thaaaat's right! If a thin-club has all these appliances and gadgets to help them be twigs, then we just have to reverse it and connect them to somewhere with a conveyor belt! If we can do that--"

"T-then we build a feeding machine!" Mewtwo interrupted, with an eager tone of gluttony while finishing Mew's explanation who just giggled and gave a nod. "Well, why didn't you say that in the first place?" the larger Psychic questioned.

"Well, it wouldn'tve been as fun to see you scare the pants off of others that way! Duh!" Mew chortled as he gave a shrug while Mewtwo just huffs and rolls his eyes. "Besides, now with them gone we can take whatever we want without worry!" the smaller Psychic added with affirmation.

"True...you're not wrong. So what should we do?"

"I'd say the best thing to do would be to..."
111221.title: Hook up the machines to power a feeding machine

112.content: Mewtwo decided to order 5 dozen pizzas. He started on the first which was soon gone. After eating around 15 pizzas, he started getting chubbier. His belly buldged out 2 feet and grew man boobs. About half an hour later, all the pizzas were gone. Mewtwo now was so fat, that he could barely move! Now, he slowly waddled to the bathroom to the scale, his belly draging on the ground. He weighed 614lb! He looked in the mirror and his face had become very chubby. He shouted that that wasn't enough. He than went to...
112.title: Big Chubby Mewtwo

choices: Teleport him to a McDonalds in London
1121.content:
<Mew! Mewwwww!!!!!> bellowed the still hungry Mewtwo.
*What is it you.....*
He stares at Mewtwo, who’s almost a living marshmellow in size and shape.
*Umm.... you still hungry?*
<Yes I am!!! This feeling is so good. I want MORE!> Mewtwo bellowed again as Mew giggled.
*Ok big boy burger king is next!*
<Please I want to be there 3 years ago! >
Mew teleports them both there. But the place is empty.
*Aww nuts!! I’m in Louisiana again! And its closed!!!*
<Woah Mew… this is alright… lots of room and food and si know you hate this state, but please feed me?> he was almost begging to be fed and Mew floated around trying to decide.
1121.title: Louisianna Burger King

11211.content:
Mew ponders for a few minutes before looking at Mewtwo.
*Hmm...ok...just this once, but only for a few hours.*
Mewtwo smiles like an exited child and waddles up hugging Mew, <Oh... thank you!!!>
*Ugh… Mewtwo... I’m little and your... sssssssoooo soft…* Mew was purring and giggling happily before returning to her senses *Gotta’ make room now,* she uses her powers to crush and mould the seating and some of the useless stuff into a bed and mattress.

Stunned Mewtwo blinks. <For me? You really shouldn’t have…>
*Aww yes I did,* she replies before forcing Mewtwo onto the bed and making a chute near his mouth as fries slide down into Mewtwos open mouth.

What next?
11211.title: Hmm... Bedded Mewtwo

112112.content: Next Mew dumped a huge container of milkshake into the chute at Mewtwo's mouth. Mew had added a special ingredient of her own to it to make it even more fattening. Mewtwo immediately started getting fatter, and soon reached...
112112.title: Milkshake?

1122.content:
Mewtwo rubbed his gargantuan stomach. What a ways he had come, and in such short time too! 614 lbs is quite a lot of weight for a body type like Mewtwo, who at one point was quite slender in appearance. His arms, which were once almost anorexically thin, now bloated out like a thick down jacket, bulging out of either side of his chest plate. Speaking of which, his chest plate had lost all "plate" like qualities. What used to be a firm layer had bloated out itself; each pectoral had softened and expanded outward, like two water balloons resting atop of his expansive gut. His neck, once extremely slender, had also gained it's own girth and had transformed into an extra chin (or two or three). His face had filled out quite a bit, and weight even seemed to go to his "second neck", which was also somehow considerably wider.

Mewtwo had always been known for having "thunder thighs", but what he had now would amaze even Zeus! Each thigh bulged out greatly, the amount of weight on them made them appear like two lofty pillows on either side of his abdomen. Well, at least what you could see of them. His stomach was by far the most obnoxiously large part of his body by far. Mewtwo's abdomen had never been that far from the ground anyway, and the additional 400 lbs to his frame had united the two. Trying to walk human style was almost a chore-- each step dragged his massive gut across the floor! Luckily, his telekinesis helped aid him in this situation, offering a much less physically taxing method to mobility. His tail had also taken one of the larger chunks of his overall gain, as it had followed his stomach to the ground. He didn't bother moving it much-- it was too much of a burden.

Yes, Mewtwo was something he had never been before, and that was LARGE. Sure, he's been intelligent, powerful, and respected, but never has his raw appearance made an impact on the viewer! Yet, his appetite to grow (as well as his appetite to eat!) was not satisfied yet, and he still wanted to keep going. "KFC should do me justice..." he thought to himself. He trudged over to the door and began to open it, before he realized that there was no way he was going to fit through there. Luckily, Mewtwo was able to simply teleport himself outside. Being psychic sure came in handy sometimes.

Mewtwo landed with a bang inside the KFC. He had to wait until a spot opened up so that he wouldn't rematerialize on anyone. His entrance certainly was a shocking one however. The entire restaurant practically froze in fear and awe. Mewtwo was probably just a little smaller than the average Snorlax at that point!

Mewtwo dragged himself over to the counter to make his order. The cashier gulped, and...
1122.title: Eat That Chicken!

11222.content:
"...may I take your order?"

A customer off to the side started laughing at this, and apparently couldn't stop. He fell on the floor, hat coming off to reveal brown spiky hair. When he finally regained his composure, he flashed a grin towards Mewtwo. "So this is the powerful Mewtwo," he said, obviously recognizing him. "What happened, fatass?" He doubled over in laughter again. "I heard it was you that took out my Nidoking and Arcanine in Viridian Gym, but--HAHahaHA--whatever did that wasn't the size of a Snorlax!!" The customer fell over again, laughing extremely hard.

Mewtwo simply ignored the guy and started making his order, but when the customer finally stopped laughing, he asked, "So, am I right in believing that you're Mewtwo?" Mewtwo didn't even acknowledge him. The customer rolled his eyes impatiently and took out an old Pokédex, scanning Mewtwo. The screen flashed up with Mewtwo's normal picture, height, weight, etc. He put the Pokédex away and glared at Mewtwo, who was still ignoring him.

When Mewtwo finished his order, he sat down at a nearby table to wait--or he tried. The booth was nowhere near big enough for him, so he chose to sit on the table. He stopped himself before doing this, however, knowing the table couldn't possibly withstand his weight. He was trying to figure out where to sit and wait when that same customer walked up to him. "Mewtwo!!" he shouted. "I haven't forgiven you for that time in Viridian Gym!!" <I battled everyone who went into that Gym, and only you have decided to hate me for following my commands. Explain yourself.> "What the hell do you mean, explain?!" <I'm afraid I don't even recognize you.> "Don't recog--GAH!" The customer kicked the table and threw his hat at the wall, creating quite a scene. The manager walked out from the back, asking, "Could the both of you please move outside? You," he said, looking at the customer, "are disturbing the other customers and you," he said, looking at Mewtwo, "are simply too large for this building." The customer started laughing again at this, but stopped fairly quickly and stomped outside after grabbing his hat. "Don't worry....sir," the manager was talking to Mewtwo again, looking very unsure of himself, "your order will be taken to you outside."

Upon exiting the restaurant, Mewtwo found himself in quite the situation. The customer had apparently drawn, with chalk, a Pokémon arena layout in the middle of the parking lot. Mewtwo, not noticing this until now, had come to rest in the trainer's box on one end of the layout. "I want a rematch, Mewtwo," the customer said. His black eyes bored into Mewtwo's purple ones, and suddenly it clicked in Mewtwo's mind who this boy--after all, he was only sixteen--was. <Wait--> "NO. No waiting. We fight NOW." <But I remember you!> "Yeah? Don't care. You put my Nidoking and Arcanine in the freaking hospital. Now you'll pay--" <But I KNOW you!!> "GOOD!! Now, battle!! Go!" The trainer threw out a Poké Ball, which exploded into a large Blastoise, ready for battle. Mewtwo had no choice--HE certainly wasn't up for a battle--so he telepathically called upon a team of cloned Pokémon to fight the battle. His own Blastoise was the first to arrive, dropping onto the asphalt with enough force to trigger a few car alarms. "What is that?!" the trainer yelled at Mewtwo, apparently not believing the cloned Pokémon was a Blastoise. It didn't really look like one, Mewtwo silently agreed, but, <It's my own Blastoise. Shall we battle?> The rest of Mewtwo's team dropped into place behind him: two similarly-marked clones of Charizard and Venusaur. The customer sneered. "I'm Gary Oak," he said, "And I will kick your ASS!!"
11222.title: "...may I take your order?"

112221.content:
"Blastoise use Skull Bash Attack!" Gary ordered as his pokemon charged the clone. A long time trainer, it was obvious Gary knew water and ice attacks on water types would be less effective.
          < Withdraw, > Mewtwo ordered the clone who retreated into it's shell to lessen the damage. Even so the crash as the pair collided was loud enough to set off alarms on the nearest cars. < Counter with Bite. >
         The clones head emerged and lunched at Garys pokemon trying to bite down on it's neck.
         "Blastoise!" Gary shouted, "Water Gun! Blow him back!"
         The cannons came out just as the clones attack came down, biting into Blastoise's right most water cannon. Both pokemons eyes widened as the jets of water began firing. The clone was forced to drink down the water as gallon after gallon passed its lips. The softer cartilage-like underbelly of the clone began to groan and push forward with the huge amounts of water it was attempting to contain. The clone tried to pull its teeth free but found them embedded in the canon and stuck tight.
         For whatever reason the display was both so shocking both Gary and Mewtwo failed to give any orders as the clones belly continued to swell. By the time either pokemon thought to try and push free of the other, the clones arms had begun to bloat, making it hard to bring them forward and Blastoise was having a hard time getting a grip on the softer mass pressing against him. The water kept flowing too, the attack never having been called off as Gary had commanded Blastoise to 'blow him back' and since he wasn't blown back the flow continued.
         Finally, just when the clone was starting to look more like a balloon than a pokemon, Gary thought to call off the attack and the flow stopped, allowing the pair to separate. The clone by now was the size of a van and bloated almost to the point of being unable to move. Strange as it was to see, Gary still smirked, figuring he now had the upper hand.
         < Time out. >
         "What?" Garry shouted across the parking lot, "Afraid you're going to loose?"
         < I merely wished to propose an offer of a prize for the fight, > Mewtwo replied, < Surely you would like to hear it. >
         Gary smirked, the win seemed in the bag, "Fine. Let's hear your offer."
         < It's simple. If you win this fight I'll become your pokemon to battle with. >
         Gary almost couldn't believe his ears. here, the most powerful psychic in the world was practically offering himself up on a silver platter. True he'd need a lot of training to get back into fighting shape, but it would be worth it.
         < However... > Mewtwo continued, interrupting the trainers line of thought, < If I win... You and all your pokemon will become my 'servants'. >
         Something in Mewtwos tone indicated he meant more than just butlers and wait staff, but even with that fear Gary was too blinded by the prospect of Winning Mewtwo to worry about it. "Deal. Time in. Go Blastoise! Knock his blimp out!"
         The pokemon rushed at the bloated clone, eager to deliver the final blow.
         < Mimic. >
         How it happened was a blur, but suddenly Gary was watching with shock as his own pokemon suddenly had it's mouth wrapped around the clones water gun and was swallowing the same long stream of water it had just pumped into the clone. And then some.
         As the clone began to deflate Gary's Blastoise began inflating in return.
         < You should know, > Mewtwo stated, < My clones are far stronger and more resilient than normal pokemon. That includes how elastic their bodies are. >
         Indeed already the Blastoise was looking uncomfortable as it's shell looked too small for it's bloating form. If this kept up his pokemon would probably explode. There was only one way out, to concede the fight.
         Garry dropped to his knees."I... I surrender..."
         The attack ended a moment later, just as Blastoise was looking fit to explode.
         Mewtwo was suddenly there by Gary, his massive form looming over the trainer. "You did the right thing. It's never worth it to risk a Pokemons life for your own gains. I know that first hand.
         "But... I lost... So now..."
         < Yes, you are mine, > Mewtwos eyes looked down on him firmly, < And I have plans for you. But if you approach them with an open mind I think you will find a few pleasent surprises... >

Option 1: Mewtwo intends to turn Gary into a female Mewtwo. He has longed for a companion for some time.

Option 2: Mewtwo intends to turn Gary into a new hybrid of human and pokemon to begin a news species of Pokemorphs
112221.title: The battle begins.

choices: Gary and Mewtwo walks back inside the KFC
Mewtwo takes Gary back to his home
1122211.content:
Gary felt stiff under Mewtwo's firm and unrelenting glare. He wished he could turn his head away from his soul-piercing eyes, but his body wouldn't let him. Mewtwo smirked as the young human squirm by just looking at him.

<Hmmm...descant skeletal structure...exceptional metabolic reflexes...> Mewtwo examined. After a few more seconds his smirk got even wider. <Yes. You'll do nicley for what i have planned.>

"Wh-what are you talking--Gah!" Gary felt his body become even more stiff and erect as a purple hue enveloped his body. His arms were pressed firmly down his sides to the point they were digging into his body. He winced in pain and bit his lower lip to keep him from crying out.

Mewtwo noticed Gary's hurt expression and loosened his grip a tad. Gary opened his eyes and shot Mewtwo an angry look. Mewtwo smiled, making his softball cheeks even more pronounced. <I hope you have more endurance then that, Human. We haven't even started yet>.

"My name...Is...Gary Oak...!" Gary breathed as the grip was still firm on his body and left little room for his chest to rise. Mewtwo watched gleefully as Gary tried in vain to break free of his psychic hold. <You let me tell you what your name is, Human.>.

Suddenly, a wave of psychic energy swept across Gary's form. He felt his muscles contact and release as they tried to make sense pf their environment. A large headache formed in his brain as it's Neuro-transmitters were being re-configured.

,I have to say, I did not anticipate my day turning out like this when i woke up this morning> Mewtwo remarked. Gary was listening, but only half-listening as the pain in his head was increasing by the second. <I suppose i should thank Mew for giving me those cookies. For the first time in a very long time, i feel happy. And your going to make me even more happy>.

"It...hurts...!" Gary shouted. His brain felt like and probably was throbbing. He would do anything in the world to just have the power to rub his temples, but they were bound to his sides.

<Woop de doo> Mewtwo patted his gargantuan belly, not really listening to the boys cries. He sighed happily and closed his eyes, eagerly awaiting the transformation's results. <I wonder what i'll have to eat afterwards. Maybe something cheesy?>

"CHEESY?! Your thinking about food when im--!" Gary couldn't finish his rant as his an immense amount of pressure formed in the back of his head. All at once, a second spinal cord erupted from his skull and shot through his back, wrapping itself around his already existing one. Gary let out the most pained, most loud, most pitying cry he had ever escaped from his mouth. Tears ran down his eyes as he suffered internally.

Mewtwo, however, did not hear his scream. He was too lost in his own mind to register what was going around him. He had just naturally expected the process to go smoothly. His eyes were still closed and his tongue now laid out of his mouth somewhat cutely as he anticipated his next meal. He rubbed his behemoth gut, giggling at the slightest touch.

<Mmmmm, if i want this to be over with before lunch, i should speed up the process.> Mewtwo lazily waved his paw and Garry felt his whole body form those familiar pressure points. His skin turned pale grey and tiny hairs sprouted up all over the place, His eyes went from brown to a vibrant purple. His mouth and nose merged together and created a small muzzle on his face.

Gary looked down at his hands. They were merging themselves into three bulbous digits. His felt underneath his clothes his stomach area and crotch just...fuse. It was too much to handle. The moment he felt himself sprout a tail, he fainted mid-process from pain.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------
Later...

<...gary...gary...Gary...Gary!> Gary heard in intervals as he slowly regained consciousness. He opened his eyes slowly and looked up to see Mewtwo's dominating form above him, casting out the sun. He had a look of worry and guilt on his face, and looked somewhat releived when he finnaly woke up. <You gave me quite the scare, Human...well...i really shouldn't say Human anymore should I?>

Gary groaned and closed his eyes again, the sun was too bright, depite him being in the shadow. He rubbed his head with his paw...paw? His eyes shot open and he looked at the horror that was his right appendage. What was once a normal, human hand, was now a Pokemon Ppaw. But not just any Pokemon's.

Mewtwo.

Gary sat up and looked at his body in shock. He was now a Mewtwo, just like his captor. Only less fat and...and...less masculine. Gary stared cautiously at the two protrusions on his new body's chest. They were big and fluffy and quite sensitive to the slow wind picking up in the air. He slowly put his paw down on it and a sense of pleasure soothed his aching body almost instantly.

<I am afraid your new body is going to take some time to get used too, As well as your...enlarged prominences>. Mewtwo rubbed the back of his head nervously. He had not expected the process wold be so painful. Gary continued to stare down at his new chest orbs before looking up at Mewtwo and asking: "You turned me into a girl?"

<A female member of my species, yes.> Mewtwo stated. <I have been lonely for quite some time, and i would have liked another one of myself to spend time with.>

"Everything hurts." Gary stated bluntly. "My bones ache and my hearts feels like it wants to punch my brain".

<The feeling will subside soon. Come on, we are going>
1122211.title: Female Mewtwo

choices: Check himself out in the mirror.
12.content:
<What about using gas mew?>

*Alright then.*

They both teleported to area 51 (abandoned because of Mew setting off an A-bomb over it "accidentally").

*We're here.* said Mew.
Mewtwo looks around to see a giant glass tube, not unlike the one he was created in except much larger and with 4 pipes joined to it.

*Step in.*

<Mew, can we just put this thing on overload and see what happens?>
*Well, it is risky but ok.* said Mew cheekily.

<I'm in.>

Mew turned the machine on.

It pumped a green gas into Mewtwos tube, making him feel weak. Then a blue liquid poured out of the tubes, slowly covering Mewtwo for a moment before it was drained away. Mewtwo noticed that he had absorbed it into his skin and the chemical had allowed his body to stretch like rubber.
While Mewtwo was totally relaxed, he was sucked up a hidden tube and taken to a 60m square room with no doors in it, only a mirror, a window, and triple king sized bed

He also saw a button, which said 'Push me Forever.'
12.title: Mysterious Room

121.content:
Floating over to the button mounted in the wall, Mewtwo considered it for a moment.

<Mew!> He called out.
Mew pops in front of Mewtwo.
*Yes?*
<Where am I?>
*Ya know, I'm not sure. I never saw this room when I was here before.*
<What do you suppose this button does?>
(Mew turns to the reader and give them a wry smile *What do you think?*)
*I don't know.*
<Well Let's find out.>

Mewtwo pushes the button. For a moment nothing happens, then a small hole opens in front of Mewtwo and sprays him in the face with a purple gas. After coughing and sputtering for a moment, Mewtwo noticed that he had started to inflate like a balloon. The short inflation stopped with him looking just slightly thicker all over.

<This is new> whispered Mewtwo excitedly.

He then pushed the button repeatedly and as fast as possible.

Gas started to flow into the room through the small hole at a alarming rate.

Mewtwo took a deep breath, sucking in as much of the gas as possible. He ballooned so fast he kept hitting the 'Push me Forever' button without trying.

He was clearly pleased.

Mewtwo grew and grew gaining more pleasure out of ballooning in size as stretch marks appeared all over his body. He felt GOOD.
Suddenly the gasses stopped, with Mewtwo nearing the size of a hot air balloon.
Mewtwo was puzzled until he felt the pressure hit him like a thousand tanks piled on top of him, but from the inside.
121.title: The Button

123.content:
Mewtwo was wandering what was trough that window and had to look through it what he saw was amazing through that window was at first a room foul of food then a room foul of water and lastly a room full of soda as the room changed from food to water to soda and bake again Mew was reading about the room and said to Mewtwo, "Hay Mewtwo this tales me that the room has three chooses to pick from a endless supply of super fating food that makes you eat and eat even if your stuffed and don't fill like you couldn't eat ever again, a endless supply of supper water that the more you drink the more you want to drink and the fatter you get but the water has a side effect it can case the person drinking it can make you have a large rubbery fake baby in you or have the user retain all water like products in their body and never need to use the toilet for everything ever again, and spacial tip of soda that if you drink it you will lose the ability to burp and deflate your belly and it will fill up with soda and gas from drinking, taking Mentos/Poprocks, and sacking your belly full of soda this will case the soda to not only make more gas but also makes your belly fill up with more soda as wall and it will also not leave your stomach for the rest of your life. What do you want to do Mewtwo it is you body we're massing with after all?"

he answers, "I think I'll do the...."

<Mew?> Mewtwo called <Where did he go now?>

Meanwhile in a control room situated over the mirror in the room. Mew was busy looking at the control panel.
*Ok, I just gotta'...whoops!*
Mews paw slipped and hit a big red button which read:

Inf.
Fat
Gain

*Here it comes my friend.* Mew whispered to himself.

choices: Continue to drink and mabe destroy his house in the process
Stop for now and continue later.
13.content:
*The shower stall is right here why not try inflating with water* Mew said.

<Alright, I'll try it.>

Mewtwo climbed into the shower and turned on the water. When he had it the right temperature he rinsed himself all over first, enjoying the feel of the shower.

Finally, steeling him self for it he put hi mouth over the showerhead and started drinking. At first there wasn't much difference then Mewtwo began to feel his stomach start to push out farther and farther. Suddenly he realized that his hips, thighs, and even his tail were inflating too. His whole body began to blow up like a water balloon, but Mewtwo just kept his mouth clamped shut over the faucet. All of a sudden, he felt a serious shiver ran up his body. He realized it was because he was now so full, that his body now filled the bath tub (which was still pretty cold).

His body now filled the shower stall and still felt that he could go further. He had a serious decision to make.
13.title: Water you up to?

choices: They both teleport to the nearest lake
Mew feeds him where they are
131.content:
More water kept rushing into Mewtwo

<I think I've had enough. Huh?>

Mewtwo couldn't move his mouth.

*I did a few things to make sure you stayed there.* said Mew with a wicked grin. *I added glue to the taps and the showerhead, I'm also forcing a dams worth of water into you every second, mua-hahahahahahahahaahahhahahahahahahaaha!!!*

<Why thank you.> thought Mewtwo distractedly.

Soon the house was reduced to rubble around them. Strangely, the plumbing system was still intact, standing there like the skeleton of the house. By now Mewtwo was so big that even though the showerhead was twenty feet from the ground, his body was pressed against the ground, firmly wedging his head in place. His arms and legs had been absorbed into his ever growing bulk, while his tail had grown so much that it merged with his body so that it was indistinguishable from the rest of him by the small nub on the end of it.
Mewtwo kept getting bigger and fatter, and he loved it. He wanted more. He needed more. His stretch marks were getting stretch marks!
Mew finaly turned it off pulled Mewtwo off the showerhead. Then he put Mewtwo on a scale, which registered a weight of 6,000 tones.
<I want more more MORE!!!> said the ecstatic Mewtwo. <I'm so happy, yet I'm not big enough, Mew FEED ME!!!>

*OK OK, are we goin somewhere, or you wanna stay here?*
131.title: Mad Mew?

132.content:
Mewtwo managed to pull himself away from the shower head and shut off the tap with his psychic ability.
Looking down he could't believe how much water his body was filled with. His whole torso filled the shower (he was suddenly glad he only had a curten instead of a glass door). His arms and legs had become ham sized and hard to move. His neck was almost completely gone, absorbed into his massive body. Looking around he could see that even his tail had ballooned out. It was as big around as a barrel.
Lost in exticy, he tried to step out of the shower. However when he lifted his leg to do so it was pulled into his massive gut. His gut was now so massive that it was wedged in the tub. When he tried to step forward, he lost his balance and came rolling out of the tub to land on his back.
After a minute or two of sloshing around he managed to get to his feet. He could now see in his full length mirrior, that his watter filled stomach now reached to the ground, on his front side...
He turned around
...and his backside. His butt also reached to the floor. And the base of his tail was at least two feet across.

<This feels so good.> he confided in Mew
*You look great too.* said Mew giving him a playful hug. *Do you want to do it some more?*
<Heck yah.>
*Then lets go outside so you wont destroy the house.*

Mewtwo quickly teleported outside and Mew followed him.

<Well, what do you think I should try now?>
*Well, there's always the hose* Sugested Mew, *or is the something else you want to try?*

Not to mention, he was having a pretty bad case of gas.

he ansers yes and takes it right alway

Mew saw that Mewtwo's belly was getting bigger frm the pop but thatit was getting bigger from the gas made by the pop inside of him she then got an idea *perhaps there's a way to help him with his growth* she thought perhaps theres a way to stop him from burpping and leting the gas grow in his gut and make it biggeras wall but I may want to tall him first*

Mewtwo was a bit puzzled. Why would there be anything useful at Area 51? After pondering it for a moment, he realized that there must be some sort of strange contraption there that might work!

<Good idea, Mew. Let's go.>

*I was just being sarcastic!* Mew yelled out, but Mewtwo didn't notice. The two of them transported to Nevada, the site of Area 51...

...but there was nothing there but desert.

<Mew...?> Mewtwo questioned suspiciously.

*Ummm... remember on the news that there was that explosion around here?*

<That was you?!> Mewtwo was getting a bit furious now.

She chuckled a little, then sighed. Humor wasn't going to help her this time.

*Now what?*

15211.content:
Mewtwo and Mew enter the immobilization center.
*Follow me,* said Mew in her mischievous little voice.
<Where are we going?>
*Nowhere,* said Mew using her psychic to pick Mewtwo up and lower him onto a giant metal slab.
Suddenly 4 metal restraints slid out of the slab and strapped Mewtwo down to the cold Steel, bed-like slab.
Mewtwo turned his head to see Mew floating at the control terminal near by.
<What is this what’s going on> shouted Mewtwo franticly trying to get free.
*Heheheh, this is going to be so fun,* said Mew with a wicked smile.
Mewtwo didn’t like the idea of Mew being in control of him.
He tried using his psychic abilities to free himself, but Mew was blocking his attempts.
*Heheheh, you aren't going anywhere. Not until I have some fun with that cute little belly of yours.* said Mew floating over and giving his belly a jiggle.
Mewtwo blushed.
<Fine. We’ll do it your way for now’. Just get on with it.>
Mew flew back to the console which button should she push.
15211.title: Mews Fun

Mew touched the part of the screen that said immobilize by belly inflation and 2 more options came up.
What will Mew choose?
152111.title: Details Details

1521111.content:
The end of a small tube falls from the dark ceiling and two robotic hands follow.
The robotic hands begin to message Mewtwos slightly bloated stomach the tube seems to position itself above Mewtwos gut and then secretes a small amount of purple liquid on his belly the hands react instantly and begin to rub it all over his bloated gut
<This feels weird...>
Mew gives him a wicked smile.
Suddenly the hands stop and the tube lowers itself, attaches itself to his belly button, and begins pumping a white substance into him.
<Ooooo Mew this feels so good…>
*You look even cuter too,* said Mew pointing to his belly.
It had grown into a potbelly and was still pushing out towards the ceiling.
*Hmmmm this isn’t going fast enough. Lets turn it up a bit and see what happens.* said Mew turning the knob on the control panel.
<Uuuuuugh,> said Mewtwo as his belly began to swell even faster he now looked like he was 11 months pregnant
<Mew, I think I've had enough. Why don’t you turn it off?> said Mewtwo blushing a bit as he felt a familiar pressure between his legs.
*Oh, But your more truthful body parts say other wise.* said Mew, looking at the exact place Mewtwo didn’t want her to, right before cranking the machine way up.
<UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUNNNNNHHHH!>
The pressure between mews legs suddenly increased as his belly quickly pushed out an amazing 4 feet.
Mew turned the machine off and the tube retreated back to the darkness of the ceiling.
Mew floated over to a heavily panting, fat, and erect Mewtwo.
<I'm glad there’s only one person seeing me like this.> said Mewtwo blushing again.
*That means I have you all to myself.* said Mew floating around Mewtwo and playing with his new belly.
She then removed the restraints, (its not like he could go anywhere in his current state) and lay on his huge belly.
*You look so good like this I think ill keep you big.*
1521111.title: Huge Mewtwo

Why do I have to stay like this?> Mewtwo yelled. *You're right...* Mew's voice trailed off for a while, then she turned around and said, *You shouldn't stay like this.* Mewtwo didn't like the look on Mew's face. She floated over to the controls. Mewtwo stared, wide-eyed, as he understood what she was going to do. <No.> he said. *Yes.* Mew chuckled. Then she set the machine on low power, so that Mewtwo could feel himself expanding as the hose pumped the fluid into him. He grew... and grew... and grew. When Mew finally shut the machine off, roughly six hours had passed. (She had dozed off.) She was amazed that Mewwo had gained...

Fat or Air?

1521121.content:
"Now the fun part begins!" Mew said, her voice ringing like a bell.

A tube lowered from the and positioned itself firmly in Mewtwo's belly button. right after words a second one lowered that shoved itself into Mewtwo's mouth. A blue liquid started pumping down through the tubes.

<Wow this stuff tastes really good!> He said in his mental voice. His second thought was how strange it was to have something being pumped into his body via his belly button. He could feel himself getting bigger. His arms inflated and started to strain the cuffs around them. His legs, started to bulk up, but mostly the upper legs, giving him a bit of a comical appearance. His tail filled up underneath him, lifting him off the table as the steel restraints snapped from his flab. His cheeks started to poof up and his neck, plus the thing on the back of his neck started to fill with fat, giving the impression that his neck was twice as thick as his head! But his huge stomach was the most impressive. It was pushing upwards constanly, it filled outwards, trippling his size. By the end, Mewtwo's stomach was four times as large as the rest of him. It was a mountainous gut that went six feet into the air before sloping down all around Mewtwo.

Mew was having a party flying above Mewtwo, and cutting off his levitation, falling into Mewtwo's body, and bouncing right off again.
1521121.title: Big Fat Psychic!

<Um, Mew?> Mewtwo asked as his stomach began to fill his vision, <Don't you think that's enough?>
*Nope,* She smiled setting on his huge gut and hugging it, *I'm gonna see just how big you can get.*
Mewtwo felt worried about that and wanted out, but he was too big now to move and Mews on powers were canceling out his. At last the table under him could take no more and broke apart, Rolling Mewtwo forward onto his hge gut, now bigger than a van and still growing. His legs could easily be mistaken for wine barrels by this point, and he could feel his toes slowly being covered by his rolls of fat. His arms were little better. His forearms were bigger around than water barrels and his hands were vanishing into them. His upper arms looked more like the size of a snorelax. His tail must've been twice as big around as an Onix now and very lumpy. His butt was his second biggest feature, with each cheek looking like a full sized sedan in size as they never stopped jiggling. But above all that his stomach reigned supreme, bigger than two vans now and still surging forwards. ALl this combined made Mewtewo feel lost in a sea of his on fat flab.

And still the fattening liquid pumped into him...

As Mew shifted her eyes from button to button on the machine, a big red one that read "Air" on it caught her gaze before slamming down on it with excitement! Soon the tubes flowed with air into Mewtwo's belly and mouth, and it didn't take long before the larger Psychic began inflating and swelling up like a balloon before the smaller one's eyes!

Cheeks puffing up round from the intake while he could feel his belly distend and grow out further and further to the size of a medicine ball. On top of that, he felt his chest swell and puff up as well as his moobs sat on top of his inflating belly. The sensation of those robotic hands running and rubbing all over that round gut felt wonderful! He could've sworn there was an extra around before his answer was recieved from grope against his rear end, which had grown just as round and puffy, bouncing and squishing against that hand while Mewtwo grunted and the inflated cheeks on his cheeks reddened! He tried to move and wiggle out of their grip but to no avail, as not only did they have a strong grip, but he could feel his limbs thicken like trunks filling up with air! Even his tail wasn't spared from the air filling him as it too thickened and expanded like a giant purple sausage!

Bigger and rounder, puffier and girthier Mewtwo became in such a short amount of time! And the large Psychic was enjoying it all from attention of the hands massaging and kneading his swelling frame as he had grown massive!

All the while Mew was watching all this in awe! What she decided to do next was...

1521222.title: Helium

info.brief_description: Mewtwo is board. So, when he starts to gain weight, he decides  to push it to the extreme.
info.description:
Geovoni has been put away for good. Team Rocket has been dispersed, and all the clone pokemon are safe and cared for at Prof. Oak's Pokemon Research center.

All except two.

Mewtwo, after becoming incredibly board, decided to attempt something that a lot of people online found impossible yet irresistible. And thus, he tries to expand on his views

Author's Notes: I want to keep this clean and straight if you don't mind. I have nothing against Gay/Lesbian people but I would just rather not see that in this story. Also, no blood and guts, I want to keep this a story for everybody. Last, no deaths if Mewtwo or another character should pop it would be just like a balloon popping, and if anyone did I'm sure Mewtwo and/or Mew could use their psychic powers to pull the characters back together again. Addition: I won't tolerate /human/ vore, creature vore is fine, though. Addition #2: Male Pregnancy, while not strictly denied, will not involve living beings being born. Unbirth may be possible, and so will artificial pregnancies, but nothing involving creating new life taking and shape just for fun.
If you need any more info on Mewtwo, a lot (along with a picture) can be found here: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mewtwo
